song.englishname: We Come To Your Throne Weeping

english.segment1: We come to your throne with weeping. We come to your throne with sorrow and shame. We come to your throne with weeping. We come
english.segment2: We come to your throne with mourning. We come to your throne with desperate hearts. We come to your throne with mourning. We come
english.segment3: We come to you. We cry out for mercy. And we turn from our sins. We come to you. Humble and broken. We fall on our knees. We come to you. We come
english.segment4: We come to your throne forgiven. We come to your throne by the blood of the Lamb. We come to your throne forgiven. We come
english.segment5: We come to you. We thank you for mercy. And the freedom to live
english.segment6: We coem to you. Singing and shouting. We come to you. We come
